name: Staring at the sea
description:
"I’ve been standing here for a long time. Staring out at the sea. Waiting for him to return."

The game takes place during the 1920s. You play as Annika, who has been standing at the sea looking for her lost husband. Finally she gets tired of waiting and begins a journey to find him to tell him exactly what she thinks. 

This project was made during the gamejam "Tidernas Göteborg 400 års jubileum" to celebrate the city Gothenburg's 400 year anniversery. The gamejam was hosted  the company Rise. https://itch.io/jam/tidernas-goteborg-400ars-jam

Credits:

Coding: lorddz

Art: Morgis and illerulf

Story: EmblaT

Music and splash images: kristalliserad
